Control Name: SEC 9.1 Implement secure key and certiﬁcate management
Control Statement: Store encryption keys and certiﬁcates securely and rotate them at appropriate time intervals while applying strict access control; for example, by using a certiﬁcate management service, such as AWS Certiﬁcate Manager (ACM).

control_attributes.Control: SEC 9.1 Implement secure key and certiﬁcate management
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you protect your data in transit?
